alert.note: Alert for Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 3:29AM EST until January 13 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed wintry precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Western Essex County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates will briefly reach 1 to 2 inches per hour during the pre-dawn hours Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
